name: Laurel County Day Treatment
description: Laurel County Day Treatment is an alternative school program serving students in grades 6-12 who need specialized educational support. The program provides structured learning environments and behavioral intervention services for students requiring alternative educational approaches.
source: Verified from official Laurel County Schools website and Google search results
eligibility_requirements: Students in grades 6-12 requiring alternative educational services
populations_served: Students needing behavioral intervention and alternative education
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official Laurel County Schools website https://www.laurel.kyschools.us/o/lcdt. Phone number (606) 862-6605 confirmed working and listed on official website. Additional phone number (606) 862-6608 also listed. Address 65 Marydell Road, London, KY 40741 verified from official website and Google Maps. Website verified current and accessible. This is a public alternative school program serving grades 6-12. All information cross-referenced with Google search results for consistency. Program provides alternative education and behavioral intervention services.
